bioconda.name: bioconductor-cellmapper
bioconda.summary: Predict genes expressed selectively in specific cell types

biotools.summary: Infers cell type-specific expression based on co-expression similarity with known cell type marker genes. Can make accurate predictions using publicly available expression data, even when a cell type has not been isolated before.

bioschemas.name: CellMapper
bioschemas.summary: Infers cell type-specific expression based on co-expression similarity with known cell type marker genes. Can make accurate predictions using publicly available expression data, even when a cell type has not been isolated before.
